Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the board the game is played on

      • addGizmo

        public boolean addGizmo(IGizmo g)
                 throws InvalidGridPosException,
                        GridPosAlreadyTakenException
        Adds the given gizmo to the board
        Parameters:
        g - The gizmo to add
        Returns:
        false if gizmo is already present otherwise true.
        Throws:
        InvalidGridPosException - Invalid grid pos
        GridPosAlreadyTakenException - Grid pos already taken

      • removeGizmo

        public boolean removeGizmo(IGizmo g)
        Removes the given gizmo from the board
        Parameters:
        g - The gizmo to remove
        Returns:
        false if gizmo was not registered, otherwise true;

      • clear

        public boolean clear()
        Clears the board. WARNING: can not be undone. ENSURE ACTION IS WANTED.
        Returns:
        true when successful

      • moveGizmo

        public boolean moveGizmo(IGizmo g,
                         java.awt.Point oldPoint,
                         java.awt.Point newPoint)
                  throws InvalidGridPosException,
                         GridPosAlreadyTakenException
        Move the given gizmo from the old point to the new point. This also updates the gizmos coords
        Parameters:
        g - The gizmo to move
        oldPoint - Where it is
        newPoint - Where to move it to
        Returns:
        false if gizmo does not exist, otherwise true;
        Throws:
        GridPosAlreadyTakenException - Grid pos already taken
        InvalidGridPosException - Invalid Grid pos

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty(int x,
                       int y,
                       int width,
                       int height)
                throws InvalidGridPosException
        Is the given space empty
        Parameters:
        x - The xcoord
        y - The ycoord
        width - The width
        height - The height
        Returns:
        true if empty, otherwise false;
        Throws:
        InvalidGridPosException - Grid pos invalid
